data.text: @EnemyInAState Almost every study needs to support vaccines, it seems. This is an incredibly myopic assessment. Did these individuals have a previous infection? Highly likely. Test window of 28-40 days post 2nd or 3rd dose? Jeez let me go get my booster right now this is so compelling!
@EnemyInAState Oh, this is probably fine. Nothing to see hereâ€”back to work and war.
@EnemyInAState Since deer ticks can transmit Lymes & other diseases, is it possible that a tick that has bitten an infected 🦌, transmit Covid to a human through a bite? 🤔
@EnemyInAState When are we going to do a housecat study? I think we might cause ourselves to go extinct if we don't quit messing around with viruses. This needs to stop.

@EnemyInAState So this is a deer variant? From deer to humans? That has been my worry. We have seen it passed from ferrets & hampster to humans already. I have been wondering when we're gonna do a housecat study.
@EnemyInAState worried the govt will order deer slaughter for the safety of humans
